name: 王鴻祥
objective:
本課程將協助學生透過參與一項非營利的創意類型服務活動，於彈性時間內在特定場域中體驗服務設計和服務學習的觀念、方法與意義。課程內容包括：（1）服務設計課程 - 授課教師講授相關理論、工具與案例。（2）創意活動服務：學生依授課教師規定的服務內容與時數，完成一項創意活動的服務工作。（3）討論與反思 - 學生分享服務經驗與精進作為，並繳交服務日誌和期末報告。
This course is to help students understand the concepts of service design with service learning and experience the service through a creative service activity in communities. The course consists of: (1) Service Design Lectures- the teacher teaches relevant theories, tools and cases. (2) Creative Competition Service- Students complete a non-profit creative competition service work according to the service content and hours specified by the teacher. (3) Discussion and Reflection - Students share their service experience and improvement, and submit service diaries and final term reports.
